description: Creates descriptive text for each room in a Five Room Dungeon outline.

input_variables.name: input_context
input_variables.description: The room number of the five-room dungeon for which descriptive text should be generated.

input_variables.name: room_number
input_variables.description: A five room dungeon outline that includes the following rooms: Room #1: Entrance, Room #2: Puzzle or Roleplaying Challenge, Room #3: Trick or Setback, Room #4: Climax, and Room #5: Reward or Revelation.
